sentences.en: A firm secures a needed commodity and is protected against price fluctuation.
sentences.cn: 公司得到需要的商品,而且不会由于价格变动而受损失.

sentences.en: A tick is the smallest price fluctuation permitted in any market.
sentences.cn: 基点是市场允许的最小的变动单位.

sentences.en: Early and adequate drainage is essential if fluctuation occurs.
sentences.cn: 有波动感时,应及早地充分引流.

sentences.en: Intensity fluctuation of any or all components of a received signal.
sentences.cn: 接收信号的部分或所有成分的强度起伏波动.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the frequency fluctuation cna be reduced by 39.6 %.
sentences.cn: 同时, 频率漂移量减少了39.6%.

sentences.en: Sometimes temporal fluctuation may take place inthe local velocity.
sentences.cn: 有时,在局部速度中可能出现瞬时脉动.

sentences.en: Such grids effectively smooth out the velocity fluctuation above the dense bed.
sentences.cn: 栅格在密相床层上有效地使速度波动平缓起来.

sentences.en: The amount of fluctuation is also affected by bed configuration.
sentences.cn: 变化的幅度也受河床形状的影响.

sentences.en: The erratic fluctuation of market prices are in consequence of unstable economy.
sentences.cn: 经济波动致使市场物价忽起忽落.

sentences.en: The erratic fluctuation of market prices is in consequence of unstable economy.
sentences.cn: 经济波动致使市场物价忽起忽落。

sentences.en: The fluctuation of ocean freight is the embodiment of market risk.
sentences.cn: 运费波动是航运市场风险的集中反映.

sentences.en: The method can guarantee the attitude fluctuation with in the allowance range.
sentences.cn: 该方法可以保证机构的姿态变化始终在机构的许可姿态范围内.

sentences.en: The relation between event rapidity gap fluctuation and rapidity correlations is derived.
sentences.cn: 本文推导了逐事件快度间隔的起伏与逐事件快度关联的关系.

sentences.en: The simplest fluctuation is the conjunction of two molecules to form a complex.
sentences.cn: 最简单的波动是两个分子结合形成缔合体.

sentences.en: Using this approach, we can abstract from fluctuation in Aggregate Demand.
sentences.cn: 运用这一方法, 我们可以抽掉总需求中不断变化的因素.

phrases.tran_cn: 电流起伏，电流波动；日常波动
n. 循环变动，周期性波动
脉动速度，波动速度；变动速度
速度波动；速率变动；速度忽高忽低

trans.tran_cn: 波动，涨落，起伏，[物]脉动，动摇不定，踌躇，[生]彷徨变异
trans.tran_en: a change in a price, amount, level etc
